path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/ArbiRoul Casino Chip Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Minting and burning tokens by casino address
findings.description: The casino address has the privilege to mint and burn tokens.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract allows authorized users to upgrade scripts without proper validation, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The CasinoChip contract has an unprotected mint function allowing the casino address to mint tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The _burn function can be accessed without any protection or restriction, potentially allowing unauthorized users to burn tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.
